com.nhn.android.maps

Class NMapView.LayoutParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
      • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapView.LayoutParams
  • Enclosing class:
    NMapView

    public static class NMapView.LayoutParams
extends android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
    LayoutParams for NMapView.

    • Field Detail

      • MODE_MAP

        public static final int MODE_MAP
        Layout mode: map relative. The child view's position will change when the map scrolls or zooms.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MODE_VIEW

        public static final int MODE_VIEW
        Layout mode: map view relative. The child view's position will stay fixed relative to the parent view, and will not move when the map scrolls or zooms.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int LEFT
        Horizontal alignment: Align left.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mode

        public int mode
        The layout mode. See also: MODE_MAP, MODE_VIEW

      • point

        public NGeoPoint point
        The location of the child on the map. Used when mode == MODE_MAP.

      • px

        public int px
        The x location of the child relative to the view. Used when mode == MODE_VIEW

      • py

        public int py
        The y location of the child relative to the view. Used when mode == MODE_VIEW

      • gravity

        public int gravity
        Placement of child relative to the location or to the map view. It is relative to a point rather than an enclosing rectangle when mode == MODE_MAP. It is relative to enclosing rectangle when mode == MODE_VIEW.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(int width,
                    int height,
                    NGeoPoint point,
                    int gravity)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified width, height and location. This constructor sets the mode member variable to (@link #MODE_MAP}, which means the child view will be laid out relative to the map that is displayed within the parent view.
        Parameters:
        width - The width, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        height - The height, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        point - The location of the child.
        gravity - The gravity to use.

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(int width,
                    int height,
                    NGeoPoint point,
                    int px,
                    int py,
                    int gravity)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified width, height and location. This constructor sets the mode member variable to (@link #MODE_MAP}, which means the child view will be laid out relative to the map that is displayed within the parent view.
        Parameters:
        width - The width, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        height - The height, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        point - The location of the child.
        px - The location of the child relative to the view.
        py - The location of the child relative to the view.
        gravity - The gravity to use.

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(int width,
                    int height,
                    int px,
                    int py,
                    int gravity)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified width, height and location. This constructor sets the mode member variable to MODE_VIEW, which means the child view will be laid out relative to the parent view.
        Parameters:
        width - The width, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        height - The height, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        px - The location of the child relative to the view.
        py - The location of the child relative to the view.
        gravity - The gravity to use.

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(int width,
                    int height,
                    int gravity)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters with the specified width, height and gravity. This constructor sets the mode member variable to MODE_VIEW, which means the child view will be laid out relative to the parent view.
        Parameters:
        width - The width, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        height - The height, either ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels.
        gravity - The gravity to use.

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams source)
        Defaults to mode MODE_VIEW and gravity CENTER.

      • LayoutParams

        public LayoutParams(android.content.Context ctx,
                    android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        Creates a new set of layout parameters. The values are extracted from the supplied attributes set and context. Due to a limitation of the UI framework, it is not possible to define our own XML attribute, so we are limited to supporting the standard XML attributes we inherit from our parent class. The XML attributes mapped to this set of layout parameters are: All the XML attributes from ViewGroup.LayoutParams
        Parameters:
        c - The application environment.
        attrs - The set of attributes from which to extract the layout parameters values.
